lines.content: * CaCa is a personal assistant chatbot that helps users manage and track your things.
* Functions with respective commands are listed below as
* - Greet user (triggered as soon as the chatbot is run)
*     - ToDos (tasks without any date/time): todo taskDescription.
*     - Deadlines (tasks to be done before date/time): deadline taskDescription /by dateTime.
*     - Events (tasks that start and end at a specific time): event taskDescription /at dateTime
* - List task (displays a list of all tasks stored): list
* - Mark task (marks task as done with a "X"): mark taskIndex. e.g. mark 2
* - Unmark task (marks task as not done and removes "X"): unmark taskIndex. e.g. unmark 2
* - Delete task (deletes task from list): delete taskIndex. e.g. delete 3
* A horizontal line to be displayed as separator for each activity with CaCa.
* A class-level array to store all user inputs.
private static List<Task> tasks = new ArrayList<>();
* A class-level method to check if task index is valid.
public static void isValid(int taskIndex) throws InvalidTaskIndex {

* This is an exception class for exceptions specific to CaCa.
* This class represents tasks that need to be done before a specific date/time.
* @param description Task description from user input.
* @param by Date/time as deadline from user input.

* Checks date/time set as deadline by the user.
* Displays the task type of deadline as D.
* Displays the deadline with its type, status (done or undone), description and date/time.
* @return Task type, status, description and date/time.
* This is an exception class for empty user inputs into CaCa.
* This class represents tasks that start at a specific time and ends at a specific time.
* @param description Task description from user input.
* @param at Event time from user input.

* Displays the task type of event as E.
